name: Kubernetes
description: An open-source system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.

name: Istio
description: An open platform to connect, manage, and secure microservices.

name: Consul
description: Consul is a distributed, highly available, and data center aware solution to connect and configure applications across dynamic, distributed infrastructure.

name: minikube
description: Local Kubernetes, focused on application development & education.

name: Rancher
description: Rancher is an open source project that provides a container management platform built for organizations that deploy containers in production. Rancher makes it easy to run Kubernetes everywhere, meet IT requirements, and empower DevOps teams.

name: Salt
description: Software to automate the management and configuration of any infrastructure or application at scale.

name: kops
description: Kubernetes Operations (kops) - Production Grade K8s Installation, Upgrades, and Management.

name: Nacos
description: Nacos is an easy-to-use platform designed for dynamic service discovery and configuration and service management. It helps you to build cloud native applications and microservices platform easily.

name: Origin Kubernetes
description: The self-managing, auto-upgrading, Kubernetes distribution for everyone.

name: Rook
description: Rook is an open source cloud-native storage orchestrator for Kubernetes, providing the platform, framework, and support for a diverse set of storage solutions to natively integrate with cloud-native environments.

name: Nomad
description: Nomad is an easy-to-use, flexible, and performant workload orchestrator that can deploy a mix of microservice, batch, containerized, and non-containerized applications. Nomad is easy to operate and scale and has native Consul and Vault integrations.

name: Docker Swarm
description: A native clustering system for Docker. It turns a pool of Docker hosts into a single, virtual host using an API proxy system.
